product.longDescription: Fruits have a moderate heat level and avg. 1 1/2" in diameter—just perfect for stuffing. Most fruits are round to slightly flattened. Very popular in Italy. Medium-size plants. Avg. 3,600 seeds/oz. Packet: 25 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Exclusive! Hot cherry for stuffing and pickling.
